00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_VERSION_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_VERSION_H
00022 
00023 #define XENO_VERSION(maj,min,rev)  (((maj)<<16)|((min)<<8)|(rev))
00024 
00025 #define XENO_VERSION_CODE  XENO_VERSION(CONFIG_XENO_VERSION_MAJOR, \
00026                                             CONFIG_XENO_VERSION_MINOR, \
00027                                             CONFIG_XENO_REVISION_LEVEL)
00028 
00029 #define XENO_VERSION_NAME       "Engines Of Creation"
00030 
00031 #define XENO_VERSION_STRING     "2.2-rc1"
00032 
00033 #endif /* _XENO_NUCLEUS_VERSION_H */
